label: Assessment
comment: The evaluation of an object, such as a product, process, or organization, with respect to the object's worth or condition.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an assurance level of this specified declaration.
A code specifying a category for this cross-border regulatory procedure, such as the appendices of the CITES Convention.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the end of this available period of time.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the report of this specified assessment.
The report identifier for this specified assessment.
The indication of whether or not this specified assessment is self assessed.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the start of this available period of time.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.
The indication of whether or not this specified assessment is verified.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
An object assessed for this specified assessment.
The assessor party for this specified assessment.
A binary file associated with this specified assessment.
A verifier party for this specified assessment.

referencedBy.comment: An assessment related to this specified inspection result.
A specified assessment applicable to this referenced standard.
A specified assessment applicable to this referenced standard.
